name: Cubicle Simulator
description:
Welcome to NeuroTek Inc! Work diligently to feed the Sentence Rearrangement Algorithm™! NeuroTek Inc loves and respects diligent workers! Also workers who are productive!

NeuroTek Inc's mission statement is to engage scalable technologies and empower virtual models in order to push the envelope in the neural network/machine learning industry, simultaneously leading the pack in developing robust and state of the art artificial (for the most part) learning platforms for semi-useful innovations!

Working at NeuroTek Inc is great! NeuroTek Inc provides exciting and fulfilling work for all employees; each member of the NeuroTek Inc team contributes significantly to the final product! NeuroTek Inc is passionate about giving its employees a comfortable environment where they can work and socialize as they please! NeuroTek Inc is really just one big happy family when it comes down to it! 

The benefits of working at NeuroTek Inc are many! With a workplace this great, you really have to see it to believe it!

Credits:

3d Modeling/Animation, Programming, and Music by Shane Torres

You can listen to the song here! https://soundcloud.com/shane_torres/5-pm

Sounds from https://soundsilk.com/ and http://soundbible.com/

Skybox by PULSARBYTES https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/worldskies-free-86517

Base 3d Character Model by Sebastian Lague https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aAO4C_8y0w8

( Thanks for playing :] )
